statements: SELECT id, sentiment_score, comment FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT sentiment_score, comment FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE timestamp < '2022-06-01 12:00:00';
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, user_id, comment FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT user_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score FROM sentiment_analysis_results GROUP BY user_id HAVING count(id) > 5
SELECT * FROM sentiment_analysis_results WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT user_id, COUNT(id) AS total_comments FROM sentiment_analysis_results GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_comments DESC
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-01';
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) FROM user_feedback GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_score FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results WHERE user_id = 100 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sentiment_score, user_id FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT user_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, DATE(analysis_date) AS date FROM sentiment_results GROUP BY DATE(analysis_date);
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisResults LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_category='Positive';
SELECT id, user_id, timestamp FROM SentimentAnalysisResults ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences WHERE notifications_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT id, user_id, action_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions ORDER BY interaction_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysisResults WHERE sentiment_category = 'positive';
SELECT user_id, theme, notifications_enabled FROM UserPreferences WHERE notifications_enabled = TRUE;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(*) AS total_interactions FROM UserInteractions GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_interactions DESC;
SELECT user_id, action_type, interaction_timestamp FROM UserInteractions WHERE action_type = 'like' AND interaction_timestamp >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, user_id, analysis_date, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT user_id, analysis_date, sentiment_score, id FROM sentiment_results;
SELECT user_id, sentiment_label, analysis_date FROM analysis_history;
SELECT feedback_id, user_id, feedback_date, feedback_text FROM user_feedback;
SELECT user_id, profile_id, profile_data FROM user_profiles;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY analysis_date DESC;
SELECT user_id, analysis_date, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results WHERE analysis_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT user_id, sentiment_label FROM analysis_history WHERE sentiment_label = 'positive' AND user_id = 123;
SELECT feedback_id, feedback_text FROM user_feedback WHERE feedback_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT profile_id, user_id, profile_data FROM user_profiles WHERE user_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT user_id, text FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT * FROM users WHERE join_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT analysis_id, user_id, timestamp FROM analysis_logs ORDER BY id
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM analysis_results
SELECT * FROM sentiment_results ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT text, sentiment_score FROM sentiment_results WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC
SELECT users.username, analysis_results.sentiment_score FROM users JOIN analysis_results ON users.id = analysis_results.analysis_id
SELECT users.username, feedback.feedback_text FROM users LEFT JOIN feedback ON users.id = feedback.user_id
SELECT DISTINCT email FROM users
